blog.name: marvelfandomchallenges
blog.title: marvel fandom events
blog.description: a place to easily track marvel fandom challenges, bangs, flings and other online events. december schedule

title: updated the event calendar!
body:
ONGOING:

You can join as an ARTIST:

CAP/IRON MAN TINY REVERSE BANG sign-ups open until: 1st of July

MARVEL UNIVERSE BIG BANG sign-ups open until 1st of September

CAP/IRON MAN BIG BANG claiming begins on 29th of September

SPIDEYTORCH BIG BANG sign-ups open until 7th of October

You can join as an AUTHOR:

SPIDEYTORCH BIG BANG sign-ups open until 30th of June

CAP/IRON MAN TINY REVERSE BANG from 7th of July

CAP/IRON MAN BIG BANG you can sign up by sending your draft until 26th of September

WINTERIRON REVERSE BANG claiming begins at 17th of June and will continue until end of the Bang

COMING SOON:

STARKER APPRECIATION WEEK 9-15th of July

PEPPERONY WEEK 8-11th of August

feel free to message me about more and follow me for more updates!

blog.name: mojo72400
blog.title: Gio's Incorrect Quotes, Ships and Trash
blog.description: I'm a 18 year old male Filipino with ADHD and a survivor of the #YouTubeDOWN catastrophe of October 16 (US time) /17 (Philippine Time), 2018 and welcome to my trashcan and ship port. I'm the captain of the S.S Starco and my fucking ship is finally sailing. Other ships aside from starco: jarco, marcapoo, janco, kellco, tomstar, foolberiot, white knight, combat goggles, black sun, renora, rosegarden, snowbird, gelato, emercury, spideychelle, sonamy, gwenvid, reylo, damerey, karmiro, leodora, kristanna, turtlebells, poetic bee, nerrison, peraltiago, disear, wilde hopps, hiccstrid, deanee, rayllum, hamliza, hamgelica, phoenix, gwiles, connverse, izuocha, midotsuyu, kamijirou, izumei, kiribaku, the big three, tamajire, todomomo, tokotsuyu, eraserjoke, kirimina, nalu, gruvia, shicca, asushin, shinrei

blog.name: amarvelfangirlthings
blog.title: Marvel
blog.description: Just Your Average Marvel Fan Girl :)

title: Black Widow: Sexual Espionage
body:
Natasha Romanoff is gay. And no one in the Marvel Cinematic Lesbian Universe is safe…

An Avenger’s Consequences

Creeping through the solitary darkness, the Black Widow gradually emerged from the shadows. Slipping through the open courtyard, the redhead vaulted over a high fence before dropping down into a sea…

Read more…

blog.name: youanilovefandoms
blog.description: When will I become the all star Shrek wanted me to be Also I take avengers requests

summary: Uh Oh I’m in trouble Part 1 pairing: Avengers x platonic!oc and eventual Peter Parker x oc summery: a girl is bored with life at...
body:
Uh Oh I’m in trouble

Part 1

pairing: Avengers x platonic!oc and eventual Peter Parker x oc

summery: a girl is bored with life at the moment, so what happens when her boredom leads her to meet, and deeply annoy, the worlds mightiest heroes. The Avengers

warnings: swearing , mentions of torture, maybe some spelling mistakes

A/N- as long as people like this i’m going to make it a series, who am i adding i’m gonna make it a series anyway. Also i hope you all enjoy this, it’s not my best work at the moment but it’s not my worst.

I had spent years learning, practicing and living my life to the fullest and, by the grand of age of 15, I had already finished secondary school and university. So what else was I supposed to do?

You are probably wondering why this Is starting to sound like the pg version of a dead pool film. Where the protagonist speaks to the audience as they explain how a lead up of events brought them to where they are now.

Well…that’s because that’s exactly what is happening. However my lead up of events didn’t involve me losing my dashingly good looks or even my sanity. No I never had those in the first place.

So this is the tale of how I ended up in a place I knew I would end up one day. In the prison cell of the avengers compound with nick fury winking at me every few seconds

So lets begin.

In west London born and raised there was a little girl who spent most of her days with her parents, loving every second. Until one day a bad man came along and said “your parents are up to no good, they’re causing trouble in my organisation” And with one little shot my parents weren’t there. That’s how I ended up in a hydra layer.

Sorry I had to do that to the tune of the fresh prince of bell air or else I get way too emotional. Anyway; yeah it was my birthday when the hydra agents came and shot my parents right in front of me. I was only 3 years old and I did not truly understand what was happening, but I did know that I no longer had a family and I was in for a bumpy ride.

I spent 10 years with hydra. 10 fucking gruelling years. Each day was unlike the rest but always the same; I was give the bare minimum of food, tortured, trained until I was either on the brink of death or brought other agents to the brink of theirs, tortured once again and then tested on like a stupid cage rat.

From day one hydra treated me like dirt, from day one I was thrusted into a training room with the misunderstood winter solider and from day one thousand eight hundred and twenty five I was hatching a plan to escape.

You see hydra thought that from kidnapping me at a young age I would never disobey there orders but they forgot one thing. At three years old I had already finished secondary school, in short I was a mother fucking genius and, like tony stark but better, I knew how to play the game.

My escape plan was meticulous and with my newfound powers, it was flawless. Oh yeah, I should probably mention that when hydra tortured me something awoke in my body. Yeah it turned out that I was a mutant and I had the ability to manipulate and control cells and particles, in short it means I can shape shift, have any powers I want and basically makes me a lot cooler than most avengers.

On the tenth anniversary of me being brought into this hellhole, I put my plan into action. Every morning at exactly five o’clock Steve, the dumbest hydra agent alive, would come into my cell and give me a slither of bread, then leave. However that morning he wouldn’t be leaving… flash back time

The low buzz echoed through out the cell, informing me that the doors were about to open. The noise no longer gave me a mini heart attack, as I knew that the guard would attack me relentlessly if I even made eye contact. Instead the noise gave me motivation; my plan was already in action.

As quick as humanly possible my body leapt from the ‘bed’ I had been lying on and in mere seconds I had camouflaged myself to blend in to the dreary walls.

Steve entered the room and placed the tray onto the ground, not yet realising I was not in my usual place. (I told y’all he was a dumbass) this stupidity allowed me the opportunity to attack a bitch. He stood no chance against me, I did train (and defeat I may add) with the winter soldier, so with out breaking a sweat, the poor boy was left unconscious on the floor and I had manipulated the cells so that I looked like him and he looked like me.

Just like that I left the cell and Within thirty minutes there was nothing left but the ashes of hell.

To be honest I don’t understand how the avengers take so long to take down a hydra attack, they are idiots. For one year I had been on the run and adapting to American life. Yeah, I had no idea that hydra had taken me to m’erica and I didn’t have any money to go back to England. I was stuck but adapting.

Within that year I had a lot of fun. I: stole wallets, learnt how to read and manipulate people so that I would benefit, learnt the whole range of my powers and survived on the streets. However that wasn’t enough.

I was bored. Like jury duty bored. I needed more excitement than stealing; at this point I had already developed a fake name and got a scholar ship into college, completed a degree. Each day seemed to suck the joy out of life into an endless black hole. So I went out looking for adventure and it was just my luck that I ran into the tony stark.

Tony stark was not looking where he was going; he thought that the world would just walk around him, as he was tony stark. Luckily for me I don’t care for the world or for arrogance. I disguised myself as a ten-year-old girl and set myself into the way of his blind walking and waited for the impact of his body to hit mine.

“You should probably look where you are going” starks snarky voice spoke to me as I crashed to the floor. “It’s unsafe othwi…” his voice trailed off as his eyes reached mine and his face contorted into one of shock and shame.

You see tony stark had come to the realisation that he had accidently pushed down a young girl, who had just started crying.

My eyes filled with fake tears as I took one last look at starks panicked expression. I let my eyes fall to the disgusting street as I awaited his new response.

“Kid, Are you okay?” Starks voice was surprisingly full of care as he allowed himself to sink to my level.

“I’m so sorry sir. I didn’t see you there.”  I made my voice seemed chocked up, like I was holding back tears. This way I could get a hold onto Starks heart.

“Kid that doesn’t answer my question. I asked if you were okay, not why this happened.” I held back a sigh of exasperation. Even when a child is crying in front of him, he is still a snarky hoe.

“Yeah. I think I’m fine. Just a bit dizzy that’s all.” My voice was small, weak and, it was something that was sure to pull of Starks generated heartstrings.

“Here let me help you stand up.” Oh he was playing right into my plan. I used to think stark was a genius but he can’t even notice a set up when its right under his nose.

Starks placed his hand in front of mine and I happily went to hold it. However I wasn’t going to let him help me up, no where is the fun in that. I was going to deflate his ego by having a small, frail ten year old take his ass down.

Luckily for me the street we were in was secluded and unluckily for him I had still been training. His guard was down and mine was up, so that meant that in mere seconds Starks ass was unconscious and thrown into a dumpster, disguised as the trash. And I had transformed myself into him.

Now this was going to be fun.

tag list (hit me up if you want to be added)

@fmb158581 @musicfreak180

A/N- as long as people like this i’m going to make it a series, who am i adding i’m gonna make it a series anyway. Also i hope you all enjoy this, it’s not my best work at the moment but it’s not my worst.

I had spent years learning, practicing and living my life to the fullest and, by the grand of age of 15, I had already finished secondary school and university. So what else was I supposed to do?

You are probably wondering why this Is starting to sound like the pg version of a dead pool film. Where the protagonist speaks to the audience as they explain how a lead up of events brought them to where they are now.

Well…that’s because that’s exactly what is happening. However my lead up of events didn’t involve me losing my dashingly good looks or even my sanity. No I never had those in the first place.

So this is the tale of how I ended up in a place I knew I would end up one day. In the prison cell of the avengers compound with nick fury winking at me every few seconds

So lets begin.

In west London born and raised there was a little girl who spent most of her days with her parents, loving every second. Until one day a bad man came along and said “your parents are up to no good, they’re causing trouble in my organisation” And with one little shot my parents weren’t there. That’s how I ended up in a hydra layer.

Sorry I had to do that to the tune of the fresh prince of bell air or else I get way too emotional. Anyway; yeah it was my birthday when the hydra agents came and shot my parents right in front of me. I was only 3 years old and I did not truly understand what was happening, but I did know that I no longer had a family and I was in for a bumpy ride.

I spent 10 years with hydra. 10 fucking gruelling years. Each day was unlike the rest but always the same; I was give the bare minimum of food, tortured, trained until I was either on the brink of death or brought other agents to the brink of theirs, tortured once again and then tested on like a stupid cage rat.

From day one hydra treated me like dirt, from day one I was thrusted into a training room with the misunderstood winter solider and from day one thousand eight hundred and twenty five I was hatching a plan to escape.

You see hydra thought that from kidnapping me at a young age I would never disobey there orders but they forgot one thing. At three years old I had already finished secondary school, in short I was a mother fucking genius and, like tony stark but better, I knew how to play the game.

My escape plan was meticulous and with my newfound powers, it was flawless. Oh yeah, I should probably mention that when hydra tortured me something awoke in my body. Yeah it turned out that I was a mutant and I had the ability to manipulate and control cells and particles, in short it means I can shape shift, have any powers I want and basically makes me a lot cooler than most avengers.

On the tenth anniversary of me being brought into this hellhole, I put my plan into action. Every morning at exactly five o’clock Steve, the dumbest hydra agent alive, would come into my cell and give me a slither of bread, then leave. However that morning he wouldn’t be leaving… flash back time

The low buzz echoed through out the cell, informing me that the doors were about to open. The noise no longer gave me a mini heart attack, as I knew that the guard would attack me relentlessly if I even made eye contact. Instead the noise gave me motivation; my plan was already in action.

As quick as humanly possible my body leapt from the ‘bed’ I had been lying on and in mere seconds I had camouflaged myself to blend in to the dreary walls.

Steve entered the room and placed the tray onto the ground, not yet realising I was not in my usual place. (I told y’all he was a dumbass) this stupidity allowed me the opportunity to attack a bitch. He stood no chance against me, I did train (and defeat I may add) with the winter soldier, so with out breaking a sweat, the poor boy was left unconscious on the floor and I had manipulated the cells so that I looked like him and he looked like me.

Just like that I left the cell and Within thirty minutes there was nothing left but the ashes of hell.

To be honest I don’t understand how the avengers take so long to take down a hydra attack, they are idiots. For one year I had been on the run and adapting to American life. Yeah, I had no idea that hydra had taken me to m’erica and I didn’t have any money to go back to England. I was stuck but adapting.

Within that year I had a lot of fun. I: stole wallets, learnt how to read and manipulate people so that I would benefit, learnt the whole range of my powers and survived on the streets. However that wasn’t enough.

I was bored. Like jury duty bored. I needed more excitement than stealing; at this point I had already developed a fake name and got a scholar ship into college, completed a degree. Each day seemed to suck the joy out of life into an endless black hole. So I went out looking for adventure and it was just my luck that I ran into the tony stark.

Tony stark was not looking where he was going; he thought that the world would just walk around him, as he was tony stark. Luckily for me I don’t care for the world or for arrogance. I disguised myself as a ten-year-old girl and set myself into the way of his blind walking and waited for the impact of his body to hit mine.

“You should probably look where you are going” starks snarky voice spoke to me as I crashed to the floor. “It’s unsafe othwi…” his voice trailed off as his eyes reached mine and his face contorted into one of shock and shame.

You see tony stark had come to the realisation that he had accidently pushed down a young girl, who had just started crying.

My eyes filled with fake tears as I took one last look at starks panicked expression. I let my eyes fall to the disgusting street as I awaited his new response.

“Kid, Are you okay?” Starks voice was surprisingly full of care as he allowed himself to sink to my level.

“I’m so sorry sir. I didn’t see you there.”  I made my voice seemed chocked up, like I was holding back tears. This way I could get a hold onto Starks heart.

“Kid that doesn’t answer my question. I asked if you were okay, not why this happened.” I held back a sigh of exasperation. Even when a child is crying in front of him, he is still a snarky hoe.

“Yeah. I think I’m fine. Just a bit dizzy that’s all.” My voice was small, weak and, it was something that was sure to pull of Starks generated heartstrings.

“Here let me help you stand up.” Oh he was playing right into my plan. I used to think stark was a genius but he can’t even notice a set up when its right under his nose.

Starks placed his hand in front of mine and I happily went to hold it. However I wasn’t going to let him help me up, no where is the fun in that. I was going to deflate his ego by having a small, frail ten year old take his ass down.

Luckily for me the street we were in was secluded and unluckily for him I had still been training. His guard was down and mine was up, so that meant that in mere seconds Starks ass was unconscious and thrown into a dumpster, disguised as the trash. And I had transformed myself into him.

Now this was going to be fun.

summary: Avengers Tower to Appear in Sony's Spider-Man on PS4
title: Avengers Tower to Appear in Sony's Spider-Man on PS4
body:
Avengers Tower to Appear in Sony’s Spider-Man on PS4

Sony are bringing Spider-Man to the PS4 in September 2018. Developers have attempted to bring Spider-Man to life in video games numerous times over the years, with varying degrees of success. 

The latest offering from Sony promises to be the definitive wall crawling experience in gaming. Naturally it was a big focus in fan’s minds going into E3. Amongst the wealth of gameplay footage released of…
